entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
